amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of a Federal Sunset Commission to review all federal agencies and programs for their efficiency, effectiveness, redundancy, and need.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 108-566 to establish a 12 member Federal Sunset Commission to review all federal agencies for their efficiency, effectiveness, redundancy and need.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brady (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 272 - 140 (Roll no. 305).
